debrief.Hypothesis: Geographic knowledge check? How much information is needed to recognize a given country.
debrief.DiagnosticApproach:
I keep checking out so many options until I finally know. A few were easy here, for example in Sweden, because I remembered how high the peak in Sweden is.
I also remembered that 3 countries in the bottom of Africa are partly forested, the rest are fully forested, but I did not remember which ones.
With South Korea it was also quite easy, I guessed right away as I noticed that it is adjacent to one country.
